deleted.description: Whether or not this asset holding is currently deleted from its account.

opted-in-at-round.description: Round during which the account opted into the asset.

opted-out-at-round.description: Round during which the account opted out of the asset.

current-round.description: Round at which the results were computed.

next-token.description: Used for pagination, when making another request provide this token with the next parameter.
